meanings.definition: A device used to measure electric current in amperes.
meanings.sent1: The electrician used ammeters to check the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory had multiple ammeters to monitor the current in different circuits.
meanings.sent3: The ammeters at the science fair were a hit with the students.
meanings.sent4: The ammeters acted like detectives, investigating the movement of electric charges.
meanings.sent5: The bright red ammeters stood out among the other tools in the workshop.
